name: Google Search - Classic Links
description: Restores Google search result links to a more "classic" style.  Reduces the newly increased font size and makes them underlined.
additional_info:
Restores Google search result links to a more "classic" style.  Reduces the newly increased font size and makes them underlined.

A very simple attempt at making hyperlinks in search results look more like classic links.  Some special search features might not be formatted quite right.  The regular expression should match most/all of the Google country domains.

Update June 2015: Change domain regex to try and include more, such as country (co.uk) domains.

Update July 2015: Google changed results from <li> to <div> elements (which is weird, since they're still in a parent <ol>...).

Update Sept 2018: Updated to support changes to search result HTML (<h3> was moved inside the <a> tag).
